paper_abstract: The BOUT code is a detailed numerical model of tokamak edge turbulence based on collisional plasma fluid equations. BOUT solves for time evolution of plasma fluid variables: plasma density N(i), parallel ion velocity V(parallel to i), electron temperature T(e), ion temperature T(i), electric potential phi, parallel current j(parallel to), and parallel vector potential A(parallel to), in realistic 3D divertor tokamak geometry. The current status of the code, physics model, algorithms, and implementation is described. Results of verification testing are presented along with illustrative applications to tokamak edge turbulence. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Status and verification of edge plasma turbulence code BOUT
